name: Paige Loleiger
responsibilities: Assists with social media content and donor outreach
about: I love playing softball, flag football, and I’m a third generation knight. I’m really excited about helping Las Lomas students and creating community connections.

name: Lexie Kou

about: I am a junior, and I love to play sports. I aim to plan and organize events that will unite our community. I look forward to helping students achieve their goals.

name: Molly Petry

about: I’m a junior at Las Lomas and I’m really passionate about helping the people around me. I’m super excited to help students achieve their dreams.
